Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin November 14, 2005 Lexxe - Natural Language Search Mobile SEO The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. At SEOChat, organicseo has posted a thread on Lexxe.com. I didn't have high hopes, but I performed several searches with very satisfactory results. The clustering technology is a good feature, and the solid "answer" at the top of the page has been accurate for all of my queries so far. How many liters in a gallon? - 3.785 Where is the UN headquartered? - New York City How old is the Earth? - 4.56 billion years Not bad for a search engine from down under. Give Lexxe a try if you're stumped for a quick answer. Copied! Back to Top
